definitions.definition: Some text or a graphic in an electronic document that can be activated to display another document or trigger an action .
examples: Click the hyperlink to go to the next page.

definitions.definition: The URL or other address that defines a hyperlink's target or function .
examples: Copy the hyperlink and paste it into an email.

main_definition: ( Internet ) Some text or a graphic in an electronic document that can be activated to display another document or trigger an action .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) The URL or other address that defines a hyperlink's target or function .
